description.narrative: Actors in basic, non-formal education and vocational training have enhanced capacities for quality teaching/learning and providing a safe and protective environment.

sector.narrative: Digital learning materials and ICT in education
Provision of skills development for multiple age groups (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision or procurement of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) learning materials
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance
System strengthening - life skills (for personal empowerment, active citizenship, etc.)
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Actors in basic, non-formal education and vocational training have enhanced capacities for quality teaching/learning and providing a safe and protective environment.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the education ministries to address learning crisis through innovative approaches in pre-primary, primary and secondary education, which have been well appreciated by the government and many will be scaled up by the World Bank. UNICEF is also addressing the participation of youths through GenU and UPSHIFT. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of schools directors (basic education cycle) trained
Number of schools supported by UNICEF to establish a functional student government
Service Delivery - Children provided with individual (one-per-child) education/early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance

System Strengthening - EMIS - Availability of an Education Management Information System that transparently feeds findings back to communities or school management committees - score (1-4), see guidance
